Name: MAGIX Photostory 2018 Deluxe Steam Edition
About the game: For moments that move you The new Photostory 2018 Deluxe – Steam Edition lets you combine screenshots, photos, video clips and music in no time at all to create impressive, Ultra HD resolution videos.Create slideshows faster with the Photostory Wizard and make them really stand out with more effects and colors than ever before. Experience smoother playback thanks to a range of performance enhancements. Create an amazing slideshow in 3 steps: Your images From smartphone to DSLR and for those who love snapshots and people who want high-quality perfection. Photostory 2018 Deluxe – Steam Edition is ready for your pictures. Import recordings with the Wizard and use cloud services such as Google Drive. Discover a world of effects New photo effects from the professionals. Lens reflections, tracking shots, zooms and color effects. Photostory Deluxe offers a wide range of creative options for telling and sharing your stories. Additional effects: [/list] Animated intros & outros Film music & background sounds Various templates for photo collages Photo border effects for portrait images Fades and transition effects from video editing Bonus: Travel route animation, DVD menus, panorama options The final touch NEW: Fullscreen mode You can now edit and customize your images in fullscreen mode - now with direct access from anywhere in the program. A total Wizard You can set the integrated Photostory Wizard to design your slideshow for you from start to finish - it will even import everything for you too. Automatic image editing ensures that your recordings will always look great. And with the shot match feature, you can give your photo subjects a uniform look. NEW: Performance Photostory 2018 Deluxe – Steam Edition uses dynamic resolution reduction for smooth playback of your slideshows in the preview monitor. Access 5X faster processing speed and smoother results overall. For perfect slideshows, stories that shine and exciting moments. Experience what makes Photostory unique.
